MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Parkfoot Court and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30pm so that we can remove generators and repair the underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:18pm on Wednesday, 11 November 2020
